feed.title: Current Watches, Warnings and Advisories for the United States Issued by the National Weather Service

entry.title: Fire Weather Watch issued June 04 at 4:33AM AKDT until June 05 at 10:00PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON AKDT TODAY THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING FOR UPPER KOYUKUK VALLEY... * AFFECTED AREA...South and east of Allakaket. * TIMING...Noon to 10 pm Saturday and again Sunday. * WINDS...East 15 to 20 mph with gusts up to 25 mph during the afternoon and into the evening hours.

entry.title: Fire Weather Watch issued June 04 at 4:33AM AKDT until June 05 at 10:00PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON AKDT TODAY THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING FOR YUKON FLATS AND SURROUNDING UPLANDS... * AFFECTED AREA...Chalkyitsik and west. * TIMING...Noon to 10 pm Saturday and again Sunday. * WINDS...Northeast 15 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph during the afternoon and into the evening hours.

entry.title: Fire Weather Watch issued June 04 at 4:33AM AKDT until June 05 at 10:00PM AKDT by NWS

entry.title: Red Flag Warning issued June 03 at 4:14PM AKDT until June 04 at 10:00PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM TO 10 PM AKDT SATURDAY FOR LIGHTNING FOR THE SUSITNA VALLEY... The National Weather Service in Anchorage has issued a Red Flag Warning FOR LIGHTNING, which is in effect from 1 PM to 10 PM AKDT Saturday. * Timing...1 PM to 10 PM AKDT Saturday.

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 8:36AM EDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Indian River County through 915 AM EDT... At 836 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Vero Beach South, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated.
